title: Bharat Bandh
text: Bharat Bandh is a 1991 <a href="Telugu%20film">Telugu</a> <a href="Political%20film">political</a> <a href="thriller%20film">thriller film</a> directed by <a href="Kodi%20Ramakrishna">Kodi Ramakrishna</a> and produced by A. Subhash. The film stars <a href="Vinod%20Kumar%20%28actor%29">Vinod Kumar</a>, <a href="Archana%20%28actress%29">Archana</a>, <a href="Rahman%20%28actor%29">Rahman</a> and Costumes Krishna in the lead roles. The music was composed by Vijaya Shekhar.
